# VSO DevOps Task SDK

Libraries for writing VSO and TFS build and deployment tasks

## Node Task Lib
Library for writing tasks with the node handler

## Contributing

### Node

Once:
```bash
$ cd node
$ npm install
$ sudo npm install gulp -g
```

Build:
```bash
$ cd node
$ gulp
```

Test:
```bash
$ cd node
$ gulp test
```

### Powershell

Coming soon
